page.title: 19HOME LIFE - Sunday
page.content: l overslept and was woken at 9pm + rushed to get to church by 9.45am. l am in the choir and my sisters go to Sunday School. The service went well with good hymns and the Vicar's sermon was on community care being an important witness. Daddy did not come to Church but sat in the garden with Grandma. Mummy prepared lunch and I went to my room to do College work. Lunch was my favourite - roast chicken, potatoes stuffing and vegetables followed by lemon cheesecake. My sister and l avoided washing up by taking the dog for a long walk to Bolderford Bridge. Then I finished my College work while my sisters made rock buns for tea which we ate in the garden. We played in the garden until dusk and then watched TV until about 10p.m. - Bedtime.
